detail_desc: Skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch and flexible denim for maximum movement. Hard-worn details, raw-edge hems and an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y). Zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Double-layered hat in cotton jersey with a heart-shaped motif on the front in reversible sequins.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, lightweight denim with an all-over print. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Playsuit in satin with lace details, a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Ties at the sides and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Gently flared vest top in jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a concealed zip in the side, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.
Blouse in airy crêpe with a small stand-up collar, gathers at the back of the neck, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
WILLIAM MORRIS & CO. x H&M. T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, an imitation suede peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Small bucket bag in sturdy imitation leather with a patterned scarf used as a drawstring. Adjustable shoulder strap and a magnetic press-stud at the top. Unlined. Size 10x18x20.5 cm.
Fitted top in soft jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Loose-knit bolero with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Leggings in imitation leather with a zip and concealed button at the back.
Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs.
Suit waistcoat in a wool weave with a back section in lining fabric. Buttons down the front, two front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Two-button jacket in a stretch wool blend with narrow notch lapels, an open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
V-neck peplum top in jersey crêpe with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, shaped cups, side support, a concealed zip at the side and a seam under the bust and at the waist. Lined at the top.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in a soft, fine knit made from organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at the front, and roll-edge cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif, hood and decorative drawstring. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the hood, neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, jersey-lined hood and a zip at the top. Low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a ribbed stand-up collar, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut, knee-length car coat in a sturdy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and two inner pockets with a button. Adjustable tab and buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Ankle-length trousers in airy viscose twill with a zip fly and button, and a regular waist with elastication at the back. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button, and gently tapered legs with creases.

Playsuit in softly draping fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Cut-out section at the back, a wide flounce over the shoulders that continues down the front, and flounces at the hems. Unlined.
Shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Wide legs with a small silicone appliqué.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover V-neck for easier nursing access, decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam under the bust with a narrow tie belt. Unlined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Double-breasted jacket in a striped weave with peak lapels, jetted front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif at the top and a lined hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Underwired bra in lace and mesh with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Studio Collection. Sandals in soft leather with wide, padded straps, square toes, an elasticated slingback strap and slim, covered heels. Leather insoles and leather soles. Heel 9.5 cm. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Metal earrings with a contrasting colour pendant. Length 5.5 cm.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with shoulder straps that cross at the back and fasten at the back of the waistband with press-studs. Elastication at the back, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with decorative gathers at the hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
A-line top in soft slub cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and sewn-on chiffon bow at the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication and a small frill trim.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a sequined motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some mohair with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft ribbed cotton jersey with contrasting colour ribbing. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Small bag in glittery imitation leather with a handle at the top, flap with a decorative metal buckle and hook and loop fastening, and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one side. Lined. Size 4x10x11 cm.

Seamless body in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck front and back with a flounce, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and straight legs.
Cap in cotton twill with a print motif on the front and covered elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved body in mesh with a turtle neck, lined front and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Nylon bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shorts in patterned, washed superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shortie briefs in microfibre with laser-cut edges, a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidery. Zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs with cut-off, frayed hems.
Cropped vest top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.

Short blouse in airy, pattern-weave cotton with inset lace sections and a V-neck front and back with a wide lace trim. Dropped shoulders and short raglan sleeves with narrow cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in superstretch washed denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Imitation suede sandals with braiding at the top, an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastener, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, fake flap pockets with a button at the top, and press-studs at the cuffs.
Velour pyjamas with an appliqué detail at the front and on the feet, and press-studs along one side and leg.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that double and cross at the back. Satin lining.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and down one leg, short sleeves and short legs.
Oversized, one-shoulder, rib-knit jumper in a cotton blend with an asymmetric cut at the top and long dolman sleeves.
